Translations.Text: For the Ilaf of the Quraysh
Their Ilaf caravans, in winter and in summer
So, let them worship the Lord of this House
Who has fed them against hunger, and has made them safe from fear
Have you seen him who denies Ad-Din
That is he who repulses the orphan
And urges not the feeding of Al-Miskin
So, woe unto those performers of Salah
Those who with their Salah are Sahun
Those who do good deeds only to be seen
Verily, We have granted you Al-Kawthar
Therefore turn in prayer to your Lord and sacrifice
For he who hates you, he will be cut off
